DOC.brief_summary: To assess the safety and tolerability of 7.5, 15 and 30 mg of sublingual lobeline.
DOC.brief_title: To Assess the Safety and Tolerability of 7.5, 15 and 30 mg of Sublingual Lobeline. - 1
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective of this study is to characterize the pharmacokinetics of three ascending doses of lobeline in normal volunteers.
DOC.criteria: Healthy individuals with a body mass index between 18 and 30. Willing and able to give written consent. Must have a negative drug test Females must have a negative pregnancy test prior to study drug administration Must have no medical contraindications as determined by routine testing Please contact the site for more information
